name: The Dungeon Power
description: The Dungeon Power is a challenging 3D-Isometric Platformer where you must to get through deadly rooms in order to advance and escape from a gigantic cursed dungeon.Timing your actions, taking chances and tilting hard is required to overcome this trial and face the Dungeon Master!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Dual-core or Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: We're still evaluating the minimun specs, if you manage to play smoothly in your device, tell us!
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
